biotools.summary: Causal Network of Diseases (CaNDis) is a web server for the exploration of a human causal interaction network, which we expanded with data on diseases and FDA-approved drugs, on the basis of which we constructed a disease–disease network in which the links represent the similarity between diseases.

bioschemas.name: CaNDis
bioschemas.summary: Causal Network of Diseases (CaNDis) is a web server for the exploration of a human causal interaction network, which we expanded with data on diseases and FDA-approved drugs, on the basis of which we constructed a disease–disease network in which the links represent the similarity between diseases.
